We’ve added a number of new features and improvements to provide you with the best oral care experience:

- Now it’s easier to sync your toothbrush handle via Bluetooth®
- Your dentist can enter custom oral care guidance for you, which displays during your brushing sessions
- Follow a pre-programmed Dental Care Journey to reach your oral care goals
- Share your activity with your Dental Professional
- See products your Dental Professional has recommended
- Browse oral care products using the in-app store
- Support for more Oral-B toothbrushes

version_name: der Oral-B-App wird es eine neue Funktion namens "Positionserkennung" geben. Wenn diese Funktion zusammen mit einer Oral-B Genius elektrischen Zahnbürste verwendet wird

version_description:
At Oral-B we always strive to deliver an optimal experience with our products. We carefully read and considered all feedback, and as a result, this app update brings you the following enhancements:
• We have made major improvements to the way streaks and trophies are processed to always keep your achievements up-to-date
• Compatibility updates for a better brushing routine with more devices
• The app has been further optimized for larger screens
• We have added further stability tweaks, bug fixes, and performance improvements to make your brushing experience as smooth as a freshly polished tooth

version_description:
At Oral-B we always strive to deliver an optimal experience with our products. We carefully read and considered all feedback, and as a result, this app update brings you the following enhancements:
• We have made major improvements to the way streaks and trophies are processed to always keep your achievements up-to-date
• Compatibility updates for a better brushing routine with more devices
• The app has been further optimized for larger screens
• We have added further stability tweaks, bug fixes, and performance improvements to make your brushing experience as smooth as a freshly polished tooth

Thanks for brushing with Oral-B! Along with a few design improvements in this update, we also have an exciting bit of news to share!
The next major release of the Oral-B app will include a new feature called Position Detection. When used with an Oral-B Genius electric toothbrush, Position Detection will help you recognize the areas of your mouth that you’re not cleaning, so you never miss a zone!
We’re very excited to bring this revolutionary technology to you soon - stay tuned for updates.

Position Detection!

Elevate your brushing routine with groundbreaking Position Detection*, which helps you recognize the areas of your mouth you are cleaning, so you never miss a zone. Now you can:

- Spend enough time in every area of your mouth during the dentist recommended 2:00 of brushing
- See which areas you do well in, as well as the areas that need a little extra attention
- Get insights and coaching to help you cover every area, every time

Want to see how well you brush? Take the Brushing Challenge and find out! Then, come back and raise your score while you perfect your brushing routine.

*Available for all Genius Powerbrush users.

Dear users, thanks to your valuable feedback we were able to improve the app and address some issues! Also, we won’t keep you from listening to your favorite music anymore.

- iOS 10 optimisations
- Background music won’t stop when opening the timer (unless sound detection is explicitly turned on)
- Other bug-fixes and improvements

The Oral-B app and your Oral-B toothbrush with Bluetooth® connectivity are now integrated with an Amazon Dash Replenishment Service!

Once you have signed up to the Amazon Dash Replenishment Service with the Oral-B app, it will measure and record how often and how long you brush your teeth. The app will order you a new toothbrush head from Amazon when the recommended limit of using a brush head is almost reached.

Amazon then sends you a new brush head right when it’s time to replace it!

Put your game face on and try Fun Zone!

Play around with different themes, characters, and more. For brushing the full two minutes, you’ll earn points and unlock NEW surprises for your dedication. Part of your session will be recorded and at the end you’ll be able to share your GIF selfie with your friends and family.

Oral-B keeps revolutionizing how to take care of your smile. 82% of people who used an Oral-B SmartSeries toothbrush noticeably improved their oral health*.

The NEW Gum Protection helps to assess your brushing and tells you where you brush too hard.

Privacy Policy updated to increase transparency and to add information required by the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation.

Experience the new A.I. Brushing Recognition for Genius X: Oral-B’s advanced technology based on an Artificial Intelligence that learned from thousands of human brushing behaviors. It adapts to your brushing style to make sure you never miss a zone, now even without your phone’s camera.

This update eliminates Sound Recognition feature, if you want to keep using it do not update it.
